statements: SELECT * FROM nuclear_power_plant_regulatory_filings ORDER BY filing_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT filing_id, filing_type, compliance_documentation FROM nuclear_power_plant_regulatory_filings WHERE status='Approved'
SELECT filing_id, status FROM nuclear_power_plant_regulatory_filings WHERE filing_type='Renewal'
SELECT * FROM nuclear_power_plant_regulatory_filings WHERE plant_id=101
SELECT filing_id, filing_date, status FROM nuclear_power_plant_regulatory_filings ORDER BY filing_date
SELECT * FROM nuclear_power_plant_regulatory_filings WHERE filing_id = 1;
SELECT plant_id, filing_type, filing_date FROM nuclear_power_plant_regulatory_filings WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT filing_id, filing_date, compliance_documentation FROM nuclear_power_plant_regulatory_filings WHERE plant_id = 3 ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_power_plant_regulatory_filings WHERE filing_type LIKE 'License%';
SELECT filing_id, filing_type, status FROM nuclear_power_plant_regulatory_filings WHERE filing_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY filing_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_filings WHERE plant_id = 1;
SELECT document_name, filing_date FROM regulatory_filings ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT filing_id, document_name FROM regulatory_filings WHERE filing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT plant_id, COUNT(*) AS total_filings FROM regulatory_filings GROUP BY plant_id;
SELECT document_name, expiration_date FROM compliance_documents WHERE plant_id = 2;
SELECT filing_id, filing_date, document_name FROM regulatory_filings
SELECT * FROM regulatory_filings WHERE plant_id = 1
SELECT plant_id, filing_date, document_name FROM regulatory_filings ORDER BY filing_date DESC
SELECT filing_id, document_name, filing_date FROM regulatory_filings WHERE plant_id = 2 ORDER BY filing_date ASC
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents
SELECT * FROM nuclear_power_plant_regulatory_filings ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT filing_type, filing_description FROM nuclear_power_plant_regulatory_filings WHERE filing_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT plant_name, plant_location FROM plant_information ORDER BY plant_name ASC;
SELECT plant_capacity FROM plant_information WHERE plant_capacity > 1000;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_power_plant_regulatory_filings WHERE filing_type = 'License Renewal' ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT filing_id, filing_date, filing_description FROM nuclear_power_plant_regulatory_filings WHERE filing_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT plant_name, plant_location FROM plant_information WHERE plant_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY plant_name ASC;
SELECT document_name, LENGTH(document_content) AS document_size FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Safety Report';
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, plant_location, plant_capacity FROM plant_information WHERE plant_location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_filings;
SELECT filing_id, filing_date, filing_type FROM regulatory_filings WHERE plant_id = 1;
SELECT plant_name, plant_location, plant_capacity FROM power_plants ORDER BY plant_capacity DESC;
SELECT filing_id, filing_type, filing_description FROM regulatory_filings WHERE filing_type = 'Permit';
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents WHERE doc_date >= '2021-01-01' AND doc_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_filings WHERE filing_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT filing_id, filing_type, filing_description FROM regulatory_filings WHERE plant_id = 5;
SELECT plant_name, plant_location FROM power_plants ORDER BY plant_location DESC;
SELECT doc_id, doc_name FROM compliance_documents WHERE doc_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM plant_regulations WHERE regulation_type = 'Environmental' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM filings ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT filing_name, filing_date, filing_type FROM filings WHERE filing_type = 'Annual Report';
SELECT plant_name, location FROM plants WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY plant_name;
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE document_date > '2022-01-01' AND document_type LIKE '%license%';
SELECT violation_date, violation_description FROM violations WHERE violation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-01';
SELECT filing_name, filing_date FROM filings WHERE filing_type = 'Financial' ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT plant_name, location, owner FROM plants WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY plant_name ASC;

SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type, filings.filing_name FROM documents INNER JOIN filings ON documents.filing_id = filings.filing_id WHERE document_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY document_id DESC;

SELECT inspections.inspection_date, inspections.inspector_name, plants.plant_name FROM inspections INNER JOIN plants ON inspections.plant_id = plants.plant_id WHERE inspections.inspection_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY inspections.inspection_date DESC;

SELECT violation_id, violation_date, violations.violation_description, plants.location FROM violations INNER JOIN inspections ON violations.inspection_id = inspections.inspection_id INNER JOIN plants ON inspections.plant_id = plants.plant_id WHERE violations.violation_date < '2021-06-01' ORDER BY violation_id DESC;
